dotProduct(Vector2D) - Method in class library.math.Vector2D
Calculates the dot product of 2 vectors, The dot product can be useful multiple calculations: If the dot product is < 0, the vectors are pointing in roughly the same direction If the dot product is > 0, the vectors are pointing in roughly opposite directions If the dot product == 0, the vectors are perpendicular
